      • areDBResourcesAddedForSession

        public boolean areDBResourcesAddedForSession(String sessionHandle,
                                    String database)
        Return true if resources have been added to this Hive session
        Parameters:
        sessionHandle - lens session identifier
        database - lens database
        Returns:
        true if resources have been already added to this session + db pair

                   throws LensException
        Description copied from interface: LensDriver

      • getWaitingQuerySelectionPolicies

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<WaitingQueriesSelectionPolicy> getWaitingQuerySelectionPolicies()
        Specified by:
        getWaitingQuerySelectionPolicies in interface LensDriver
        Returns:
        The WaitingQueriesSelectionPolicys to be used to select waiting queries eligible to be moved out of waiting state. If there are no driver level waiting query selection policies, then an empty set is returned. null is never returned.
